getMyFacebookFriends

public static com.google.gson.JsonObject getMyFacebookFriends(java.lang.Long facebook_id,
                                                              java.lang.String access_token)
Get the facebook friends for the given user; used as a helper for the login function

Parameters:
facebook_id -
access_token - an up to date access_token for logging into the facebook API
Returns:
a json object containing all the users facebook friends; this object should be checked for presence of an "error" element indicating there was an issue contacting the facebook API

diffInSecs

Calculate the difference between 2 dates in seconds

Parameters:
d1 - the first date
d2 - the second date
Returns:
number of seconds d2 is greater than d1
